snippet.title: Curious Expedition - 1.0 Release trailer
snippet.description:
Version 1.0 available now!  
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/358130/Curious_Expedition/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/curious_expedition_the
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/curious-expedition
Itch: https://maschinen-mensch.itch.io/curious-expedition

NEW! CONSOLE RELEASE! APRIL 2020: Curious Expedition is now also available for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

Curious Expedition is a roguelike expedition simulation set in the late 19th century, in which you will venture on unprecedented expeditions to regions never explored before.

http://www.curious-expedition.com

Voiceover by ManyATrueNerd https://www.youtube.com/user/ManyATrueNerd

Coming in 2020: Curious Expedition on consoles & Curious Expedition 2!
